title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 20, 2023

items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Ada
items.content_text:
### Science / Apache License

*   [units-of-measurement](http://www.dmitry-kazakov.de/ada/units.htm) - Library to manage units of measurement with dimension checking.
*   [si\_units (⭐8)](https://github.com/HeisenbugLtd/si_units) - Utility library to pretty print physical values in proper metric units.
items.content_html:
Science / Apache License

  • units-of-measurement - Library to manage units of measurement with dimension checking.
  • si_units (⭐8) - Utility library to pretty print physical values in proper metric units.

items.title: Awesome Terraform
items.content_text:
### Self-hosted Terraform Platforms / IDE

*   [cloud-concierge (⭐236)](https://github.com/dragondrop-cloud/cloud-concierge) - Open Source, codify unmanaged resources as Terraform, detect drift, and cloud cost and security analysis, delivered as a Pull Request.
items.content_html:
Self-hosted Terraform Platforms / IDE

  • cloud-concierge (⭐236) - Open Source, codify unmanaged resources as Terraform, detect drift, and cloud cost and security analysis, delivered as a Pull Request.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_html:
Completions / superconsole - Windows-only

  • miniconda (⭐1) - Tab completions for miniconda.

items.title: Awesome Ddd
items.content_text:
### Video Collections

*   [Visuality DDD webinars](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLvMNoWK93wtnu9JcSEYnFRgzqbxtLtZZ4) - A YouTube collection of webinars focused on DDD in Ruby on Rails

### Community Resources

*   [DDD in Ruby on Rails](https://www.visuality.pl/posts/introduction-to-ddd-in-ruby-on-rails) - A collection of articles on Domain-Driven Design in Ruby on Rails
items.content_html:
Video Collections

  • Visuality DDD webinars - A YouTube collection of webinars focused on DDD in Ruby on Rails

Community Resources

  • DDD in Ruby on Rails - A collection of articles on Domain-Driven Design in Ruby on Rails

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Motion / Servo

*   [MicroPython\_MOTOR (⭐1)](https://github.com/jposada202020/MicroPython_MOTOR) - MicroPython Helper for controlling PWM based motors.
items.content_html:
Motion / Servo

  • MicroPython_MOTOR (⭐1) - MicroPython Helper for controlling PWM based motors.

items.title: Awesome Gnome
items.content_text:
### Icons / Upstream Style

*   [MoreWaita (⭐729)](https://github.com/somepaulo/MoreWaita) - An Adwaita-style icon theme for Gnome Shell.
items.content_html:
Icons / Upstream Style

  • MoreWaita (⭐729) - An Adwaita-style icon theme for Gnome Shell.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### (requires Neovim 0.5)

*   [nvimdev/lspsaga.nvim (⭐3.7k)](https://github.com/nvimdev/lspsaga.nvim) - A light-weight LSP plugin based on Neovim's built-in LSP with a highly performant UI.

### Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

*   [nvimdev/zephyr-nvim (⭐364)](https://github.com/nvimdev/zephyr-nvim) - A dark colorscheme with Tree-sitter support.

### Startup / Diagnostics

*   [nvimdev/dashboard-nvim (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/nvimdev/dashboard-nvim) - A minimalist dashboard, inspired by doom-emacs.

### Formatting / Diagnostics

*   [elentok/format-on-save.nvim (⭐173)](https://github.com/elentok/format-on-save.nvim) - A synchronous formatter that combines LSP and non-LSP formatting (e.g. shfmt, stylua, prettier), focused specifically on format-on-save.
items.content_html:
(requires Neovim 0.5)

  • nvimdev/lspsaga.nvim (⭐3.7k) - A light-weight LSP plugin based on Neovim's built-in LSP with a highly performant UI.

Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

  • nvimdev/zephyr-nvim (⭐364) - A dark colorscheme with Tree-sitter support.

Startup / Diagnostics

  • nvimdev/dashboard-nvim (⭐2.6k) - A minimalist dashboard, inspired by doom-emacs.

Formatting / Diagnostics

  • elentok/format-on-save.nvim (⭐173) - A synchronous formatter that combines LSP and non-LSP formatting (e.g. shfmt, stylua, prettier), focused specifically on format-on-save.

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Large Language Models (LLMs)

*   [microsoft/semantic-kernel (⭐25k)](https://github.com/microsoft/semantic-kernel): integrate cutting-edge LLM technology quickly and easily into your apps
*   [CoPrompt](https://www.coprompt.io/login): platform for teams to use ChatGPT together

### Autonomous LLM Agents / Prompt Engineering for Text-to-image

*   [Introducing AACP | SuperAGI](https://superagi.com/introducing-aacp-agent-to-agent-communication-protocol/): agent to agent communication protocol
*   [BrainstormGPT](https://brainstormgpt.ai/#/): AI multi-agent problem solving

### Image Upscaling / Deforum

*   [Remini - AI Photo Enhancer](https://remini.ai/): photo and video enhancer

### Text-to-speech (TTS) and avatars / Deforum

*   [Shaunwei/RealChar (⭐6.2k)](https://github.com/Shaunwei/RealChar): AI Character/Companion in Realtime
*   [UneeQ Digital Humans](https://www.digitalhumans.com/): 3D character lib synced
items.content_html:
Large Language Models (LLMs)

  • microsoft/semantic-kernel (⭐25k): integrate cutting-edge LLM technology quickly and easily into your apps
  • CoPrompt: platform for teams to use ChatGPT together

Autonomous LLM Agents / Prompt Engineering for Text-to-image

  • Introducing AACP | SuperAGI: agent to agent communication protocol
  • BrainstormGPT: AI multi-agent problem solving

Image Upscaling / Deforum

  • Remini - AI Photo Enhancer: photo and video enhancer

Text-to-speech (TTS) and avatars / Deforum

  • Shaunwei/RealChar (⭐6.2k): AI Character/Companion in Realtime
  • UneeQ Digital Humans: 3D character lib synced

items.title: Awesome Webxr
items.content_text:
### Development / Frameworks and Libraries

*   [X3DOM](https://x3dom.org) - A framework for integrating and manipulating X3D scenes as HTML5/DOM elements.
    *   [Official Documentation](https://doc.x3dom.org/)
items.content_html:
Development / Frameworks and Libraries

  • X3DOM - A framework for integrating and manipulating X3D scenes as HTML5/DOM elements.
    • Official Documentation
